title: Kafka replication development - Apache Kafka - Apache Software Foundation
content:
This page organizes Kafka 0.8 (replication) development into the following tracks:
Jira tag
Description
features
Core features
bugs
Known bugs. (This may seem redundant to jira's 'type' field, but this label helps address incorrect classifications at the type level.)
tools
e.g., migration tool, producer performance improvements, etc.
replication-testing
Anything to do with unit/system tests/testing framework.
optimization
Not bugs, but enhancements, refactoring, nice-haves and such.
